channel.title: communications equipment on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in communications equipment on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Meisei Logo
Meisei Electric Co. is a Japanese limited company which manufactures electronics and communications equipment. Founded as a radio and electrical firm in 1938, it now specialises in geological and meteorological sensors, though it has also been involved in developing avionics and spaceflight technology. It is headquartered in the city of Isesaki in Gunma Prefecture, and operates a maintenance and personnel management subsidiary in the same area. In 2012, Meisei Electric was listed among “Asia’s 200 Best Companies Under a Billion” by Forbes.
You can download theMeiseilogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Meisei
item.description: Meisei Electric Co. is a Japanese limited company which manufactures electronics and communications equipment. Founded as a radio and electrical firm in 1938, it now specialises in geological and meteorological sensors, though it has also been involved in developing avionics and spaceflight technology. It is headquartered in the city of Isesaki in Gunma Prefecture, and operates a maintenance and personnel management subsidiary in the same area. In 2012, Meisei Electric was listed among “Asia’s 200 Best Companies Under a Billion” by Forbes.
